page.title: 14The Melling Hall Hotel.
page.content: Originally a private house,Melling Hall is now a residential hotel; the meeting place for clubs in the area. The Lunesdale Rotary club meet weekly; Bentham Round Table fortnightly;N.F.U. monthly;the Car Club in the winter. The hotel can accommodate 26 visitors, tourists or business people. Bar meals are served,evening dinner and Sunday lunch. Locals enjoy meeting visitors. The public bar has a pool table and darts and on summer days families can sit outside. There is a ballroom which is regularly booked for birthdays, wedding receptions and parties. The Lune Valley Jazz Band <amateurs> play there once a month. A doctors' surgery is held once a week. For 90p the land- lady provides lunch for about 12 old age pensioners once a fortnight and some village ladies make the puddings. Everyone is made welcome!
